name: Wonderland (C64)
description:
A classic Zelda like game for your beloved C64. Crammed into a 16kB cartridge you have 240 screens to search!

Find dungeons, gather keys to unlock doors, find better weapons and tools. Can you defeat the four devious dragons and place the crystals at the Altar of Winds?

It's tough! A minimap is included.

Controls via Joystick. Keep button pressed to enter the equiment screen.
